inputs.name: StepSettings
inputs.value:
{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"InvClientAntivirus_CL 
| summarize CollectionTime_t = arg_max(CollectionTime_t,*) by Computer
| where PrimaryAntivirusProduct_s !contains "Defender"
| project Computer, UserLoggedOn_s, CollectionTime_t, PrimaryAntivirusProduct_s, PrimaryAntivirusEXE_s, PrimaryAntivirusProductStateCode_d, PrimaryAntivirusProductStateTimestamp_s, PrimaryAntivirusRealTimeStatus_s, PrimaryAntivirusDefinitionStatus_s,Alternative1AntivirusProduct_s, Alternative1AntivirusEXE_s, Alternative1AntivirusProductStateCode_s, Alternative1AntivirusProductStateTimestamp_s
| sort by Computer asc 
| summarize total = count()","size":0,"title":"OTHER PRIMARY ANTIVIRUS (SECURITY CENTER) | CLIENTS | COUNT","noDataMessageStyle":5,"queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces","crossComponentResources":["/subscriptions/eada95ac-0b22-40dd-bbd7-caa457268860/resourcegroups/we-rg-monitoring-p/providers/microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces/CASA-ws"],"visualization":"tiles","gridSettings":{"rowLimit":10000},"tileSettings":{"titleContent":{"columnMatch":"total","formatter":12,"formatOptions":{"min":0,"palette":"redBright"}},"showBorder":true,"size":"auto"}}
